attributes.action: Offer the Republic of Ireland the chance to rejoin the UK
attributes.background: Due to brexit the Irish border could cause threat to people's jobs and livelihoods since the likely hood of a hard boarder would be iminint, therefore it would both benefit the UK and Ireland if they rejoined! It would also boost the economy.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because decisions about the Republic of Ireland's future are the responsibility of the people and government of the Republic of Ireland and not the UK Government or Parliament.
